p: The cancer cells lines Hep3B (liver) and Hela (cervical) were grown in media supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum and 1% penicillin-streptomycin antibiotics and maintained in a CO 2 incubator at 37 Â°C in 5% CO 2. The medium was changed every 2 days until the cells reached confluence, at which point they were subcultured.
